The content of the job ads: which included specific details such as job descriptions, requirements, and instructions for application.
The comments and responses from Facebook: indicating their interest and engagement with the job ads.
Verification from official representativ: Cola, who confirmed that the job ads were fake and not affiliated with their respective companies.
Investigation into the source of the job: which revealed that the website hosting the ads had an IP address in Mumbai, India, suggesting a lack of authenticity.
